item.title: OWASP purpleteam
item.description: Carl and Richard chat with Kim Carter about purpleteam, an open-source project for testing web applications and APIs as part of your CI/CD pipeline

item.title: Purpleteam at Alpha
item.description: Where has Kim been for the last couple of years? This post explains why he’s been so quiet and what he has been working on.

item.title: Talk - Building purpleteam (a Security Regression Testing SaaS) - From PoC to Alpha
item.description: Developers / Engineers know that a build pipeline is an essential part of creating robust and reliable software, but what to put in it? This talk covers the creation of purpleteam from PoC to Alpha release, and why it’s an ideal fit for the security regression testing slot of your build pipeline.

item.title: How to Increase Software Developer Productivity
item.description:
Redirects to legacy blog post.

Is your organisation:

  • Wanting to get more out of your Software Developers?
  • Wanting to increase RoI?
  • Spending too much money fixing bugs?
  • Development team not releasing business value fast enough?
  • Maybe your a software developer and you want to lift your game to the next level?

If any of these points are of concern to you… read on.
